sprint_goal: Establish the secure, sandboxed transformation engine backend and the foundational API for script CRUD operations.
Develop the core script editor UI with Monaco and implement the critical preview functionality with structured error handling.
Implement full script versioning (history, diff, revert) and secure scripts with at-rest encryption.
Implement comprehensive auditing, Prometheus monitoring, and the feature flag for a controlled rollout.
Finalize operational readiness by implementing performance benchmarks and creating all user and technical documentation.
